item.title: How to implement Travis CI to a Hugo site
item.description: What is Travis? Travis is a continuous integration testing tool that integrates with GitHub. It allows you to run automated tests on your code each time a commit is made to the repository. How? Sign in Travis in https://travis-ci.org/ using github account. Enable Source github repo in Travis setting, eg.kencho51/gigathing Create Personal access token in github, the scopes include: repo admin:public_key admin:repo_hook user Copy the token generated and update the Travis Environment Variables as below: GH_TOKEN: paste the github GITHUB_EMAIL: kencho.
